name: Typhlomys nanus
description: Typhlomys nanus, also known as the dwarf tree mouse, is a species of rodent of the family Platacanthomyidae found in eastern and north-eastern Yunnan, China, at middle to high elevations. The species was discovered in 2017 by Cheng et al. (2017) based on populations previously attributed to the Chinese pygmy dormouse.
